q: why does he skip the rope in the video
pred: The man in the video skips the rope to warm up his muscles and increase his heart rate before starting his workout. This is a common practice among athletes and fitness enthusiasts to prepare their bodies for the physical activity they are about to engage in. By warming up, the muscles become more flexible, and the blood vessels dilate, allowing for better blood flow and oxygenation. This helps to prevent injuries and improve overall performance during the workout.
